definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: The town is notorious for its casinos.
sentences.chinese: 這個城市因其衆多的賭場而遠近皆知。

sentences.english: He seems to know everybody; he really gets around.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎認識每一個人，真可謂遠近皆知。

sentences.english: He that is mighty by a bold tongue is known afar off, but a wise man knoweth to slip by him.
sentences.chinese: 雄辯的人遠近皆知，但明智人卻知道自己失足的地方。
